Oct. 23, 1978 D Oldham Entertainment Contest
Oldham Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
oldham-entertainment-contest
None
Assembly Hall, Market Street, Royton, Oldham Bands were also judged on deportment to give the final total. Prizes - 1st £60 and trophy, 2nd £50, 3rd £40, 4th £30. 4 bands competed.
